definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
(Buddhism) the pain of parting with what (or whom) one loves, one of the eight distresses 八苦[ba1 ku3]

sentences.english: The most reluctant were always the days of separation.
sentences.chinese: 总是难舍别离日，最是难忘少年时。

sentences.english: No matter how many miles have tried tied together, not be considered as leave.
sentences.chinese: 不管多少里路也试过缠在一起，未算别离。

sentences.english: The theme of poetry about seeing off someone going to his post dominates a great proportion of all poems in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 送人赴任之作，在唐代别离诗中占有相当大比例。

sentences.english: Never parting, just know how deep love.
sentences.chinese: 从来就是别离时，才知爱有多深。

sentences.english: Ever has it been that love know…
sentences.chinese: 爱的体认，只有在别离之际才知其深。

sentences.english: Why is lover's terminal separation, the fact they know sign?
sentences.chinese: 为何情人的终站是别离，事实他们知道启事吗？

sentences.english: It's time to leave, to know how deep love is.
sentences.chinese: 从来就是别离时，才知爱有多深。

sentences.english: Repeated deducing to meet the separation from the scene, repeat the tears.
sentences.chinese: 重复地演绎着从相逢到别离的一幕，重复着流泪。

sentences.english: Love is like this , so is long or forever parting .
sentences.chinese: 爱情如是，生死别离如是。

sentences.english: Peace， my heart， let the time for the parting be sweet.
sentences.chinese: 安静吧，我的心，让别离的时间甜柔吧。

sentences.english: Stop to summer, with branches parting, Jiangnan much rain.
sentences.chinese: 驻足夏日，叹花枝别离，江南多烟雨。

sentences.english: After the opening ceremony, conducted every year Guangbo Cao game.
sentences.chinese: 开幕式竣事后，别离进行了各个班级的广播操比赛。

sentences.english: Weeping willow wind, see the flowers and leave.
sentences.chinese: 风静杨柳垂，看花又别离。

sentences.english: You leave your memory as a flame to my lonely lamp of scparation.
sentences.chinese: 你把你的记忆当作一星火焰留在我孤零的别离之灯里。

sentences.english: The seagull fly off, the waves roll away and we apart.
sentences.chinese: 海鸥飞走了，浪涛滚滚向前，而我们也该做别离。

definition: to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
to bid farewell/to part (usually with little hope of meeting again)
separated in life and death/to part for ever
to think of/to long for/to miss
to see each other/to meet in person
